column4: I'm running natty on a VM in vista. I just installed ubu and set up unity, but the windowing system is still classic gnome. where would I go to fix this?
which virtualization software are you using?
virtual box
latest version
did you enable 3d support in the display settings of virtual box?
yes
guest tools as well?
but when it first ran ubu during setup, it said that I didn't have the correct hardware and went into classic mode
after the installation, I mounted and ran the guest tools
then did an update, and restarted, but alas, still classic
ok. at the login screen, down near the bottom, there should be an option for the session
I believe it was Ubuntu, ill restart
note that the unity panel on the left appears
just the windowing system is classic
huh... that's odd
ill post a screenshot once it restarts
I think I'm using the wrong words here
the windowing system is okay
but some of the menus and the main unity menu look classic
http://www.pasteall.org/pic/show.php?id=14100
huh. that is weird... I dunno how to explain that. A theme?
